resume_text:
NAME: Charlie Brown
EMAIL: charlie.brown@email.com
PHONE: (555) 345-6789

SUMMARY:
Passionate DevOps engineer with 5 years of experience in automating software deployment and infrastructure management. Skilled in using DevOps tools and practices to improve software delivery pipelines.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Git, Linux

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Inc - DevOps Engineer (2019 - Present)
- Automated software deployment and infrastructure management using Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
- Implemented continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using Jenkins and Git.

IT Services Corp - System Administrator (2018 - 2019)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers.
- Troubleshooted system issues and implemented solutions.

EDUCATION:
Arizona State University - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2018)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Certified Kubernetes Administrator
